p.d: Lisa is hosting a Somalian family while they wait to be received by the Aliens Department. An encounter between two worlds, both with goodwill and the challenge of communicating. Amidst the silence, doubt and anxiety arise... Direction, screenplay: Catherine Cosme (Belgium, 2018) Cast: MaIa Sandoz (Lisa), Consolate Sip√©rius (Houria), Nathan Damna (Ahmed), Thalya Shimba Genre: drama
